## Learning Outcomes {.ch}

After completing Class 2 you should...

* Know the definition/defining equation for stoichiometric coefficient, elementary reaction, true/apparent extent of reaction, mathematically independent reaction/equation, heat of reaction, exothermic/endothermic reaction, equilibrium, reversible/irreversible reaction, conversion, limiting reactant, overall yield, overall selectivity, and parallel/series/series-parallel reaction networks
* Be able to
    * identify a set of mathematically independent reactions/equations
    * identify limiting reactants
    * write and use equations inter-relating initial composition, current composition, stoichiometry, and reaction progress
    * calculate heat of reaction as a function of temperature
